artist: Painter: Rembrandt Harmensz. van Rijn; Engraver: Nicolas Gabriel Dupuis; Publisher: Salomon Gautier
description: man facing left looking at viewer wearing cloak, jacket with small ruff, large brim hat, left arm across body
inscription:
Signature, and Inscription

on sheet in black [Rembrandt pinx   N. Dupuis jun Sculp/London/ Ex Museo An Cousin/ Sold by Salomon Gautier at ye Crown & Pearl under ye great Piazza Covent Garden]; inpencil on sheet: [1-369]
title: Portrait of Herman Doomer
